name: SuDoKu ExTrEmE
description:
Tired of the old 9 x 9 game of SuDoKu? Are you looking for the next level?

Look no more.

This SuDoKu allows you to create multiple layers of sudoku boards that connect to one another in a relevant way. Complete all board to win.

There's an in-game tutorial for those looking for help on how to play.
